name: ThirdPerson
author: Davi & NotAKidoS
description: Allows you to go into third person view by pressing Ctrl + T to toggle and Ctrl + Y to change the mode
changelog:
- Made thirdperson camera parent to Desktop camera instead of active camera.
- Copy postprocessing settings from player camera on world start.
  - This fixed HUD rendering twice in thirdperson due to game update.
- Added CameraFovClone component to copy zoom from desktop camera.
- Removed logic that disabled thirdperson when opening a menu, as Game UI renders on top anyways.
